name: The Dice Wizards Army
description:
The Evil Wizard of Dice is sending his army of crystal minions to slay you. Will you be able to survive his wrath?

--------------

Controlls:

WASD - movement

Space - jump

Shift - Sprint (unlimited)

Left mouse button - fire left weapon

right mouse button - fire right weapon

Q - buy left weapon (also other interact)

E - Buy right weapon (also other interact)

--------------

Game made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
